title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.1 - Finding of necessity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 43.1 - Finding of necessity

State Regulations

The board finds that this Part (rule) governing the
construction, maintenance, use and operation of coin-operated machines which
perform a manufacturing process is necessary for the protection of the lives, health and safety of employees and of persons lawfully using such
machines. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
43.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
